features: SheaMoisture’s Coconut and Hibiscus Curl and Shine Conditioner is a natural, lightweight moisturizing conditioner that restores hair shine and smoothes dry hair cuticles
This hair conditioner is a coconut oil hair treatment and conditioner for shine that ensures you have no more knots, snarls or tangles — just soft, shining, easy to style hair wash after wash
A conditioner for hair, coconut oil conditioner and conditioner for shine that helps tame frizz as it defines and enhances natural curls
SheaMoisture's curl and shine conditioner relieves dry hair, thanks to our Shea Butter and moisture-rich oils. This is the best hair conditioner for hair shine on thick, curly hair
How to use hair shampoo and conditioner: After shampooing, apply conditioner generously and comb through for even distribution. Leave shiny hair conditioner in for 3 minutes. Rinse. Style as desired
body.description: SheaMoisture’s Coconut and Hibiscus Curl and Shine Conditioner is a natural, lightweight moisturizing conditioner that restores hair shine and smoothes dry hair cuticles. This hair conditioner is a coconut oil hair treatment and conditioner for shine that ensures you have no more knots, snarls or tangles — just soft, shining, easy to style hair wash after wash! A conditioner for hair, coconut oil conditioner and conditioner for shine that helps tame frizz as it defines and enhances natural curls. SheaMoisture's curl and shine conditioner relieves dry hair, thanks to our Shea Butter and moisture-rich oils. This is the best hair conditioner for hair shine on thick, curly hair. How to use hair shampoo and conditioner: After shampooing, apply conditioner generously and comb through for even distribution. Leave shiny hair conditioner in for 3 minutes. Rinse. Style as desired. Our sulfate free conditioner, paraben free conditioner and phthalate free conditioner by SheaMoisture has been tested on our family for generations and never on animals. SheaMoisture Story: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SheaMoisture's Coconut & Hibiscus Curl & Shine Conditioner is a lightweight hair care product that restores and smooths dry hair cuticles without weighing your hair down. This moisturizing shine conditioner ensures you have no more knots, snarls or tangles - just soft, shining, easy-to-style hair, wash after wash!

Soft & Detangle Frizzy Hair This moisturizing conditioner instantly infuses your curls and coils with intense moisture and shine-enhancing nutrients. Together, We Give Back With every purchase, you support our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Tried, True & Cruelty-Free Tested on friends & family for generations—never on an animal. SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker We honor the vision of this pioneering mother and entrepreneur by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa.

COCONUT & HIBISCUS CURL & SHINE CONDITIONER COCONUT & HIBISCUS CURL & STYLE MILK COCONUT & HIBISCUS CURL ENHANCING SMOOTHIE Main Benefit Nourishing hair treatment that delivers intense moisture to make your curls soft, smooth and frizz-free! Leave-in moisturizer and hair treatment that leaves curly, natural hair soft, shiny and bouncy. Considered by many to be one of the best curl- defining products for hair that's naturally curly or coily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product works really well for all different hair types. My significant other and I both used it and it lasted quite a while. I highly recommend buying this for your hair of you constantly are getting tangled. You will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Su olor es super rico y ayuda con la hidratación del cabello. Y define los rizos muy bien
reviews.reviewText: Me regalaron su versión pequeña y me gustaron. Por ende decidí pedirlo en su tamaño grande.Los compre junto con otra persona.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how it leaves a coconut smell to my hair work good with curly hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan of the pump, but love the product
reviews.reviewText: So, I do the Curly Girl Method with my hair, and this is the best product I've used on my hair so far. My curls look like springs and feel soft and healthy. Very little frizz. 9/10 just because the pump gets clogged easily and doesn't always pump out well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good..if only
reviews.reviewText: I like the scent of this conditioner and how it leaves my hair. My only complaint is the pump is too small for such a thick conditioner. A new design is badly needed for this. I was transferring some of the conditioner in the original bottle to a travel bottle and it took forever to do that due to the thickness of the conditioner. Fix the bottle design and this will be perfect in every way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice. Great product. Great Shipping. Great priceery
reviews.reviewText: Very Nice for all types of Hair. Great product. Great Shipping. Great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best conditioner I've ever used!
reviews.reviewText: Blows any Pantene, tresemme or other name brand product out of the water! I have frizzy thick curls and this makes my hair smooth, shiny, tamed and curls defined.
